pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pattanillehakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.5: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca pattanillehakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.11: parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā nillehitvā bhuñjati,
